name: Power Kush
description: A popular cannabis strain in Amsterdam, the buds of Power Kush have an abundance of resin with white and orange hairs. The aroma is likened to a sweet skunk smell with a light touch of strawberry and orange. The effects are both cerebral and physical with a THC content up to 16% and a CBD of 0.18%. Flowering time is 7-8 weeks.Â
attributes_title: Relaxed, Sleepy, Euphoric, Happy, Uplifted, Stress, Pain, Depression, Muscle Spasms, Fatigue, Paranoid, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Dry Eyes, Anxious
